ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Greetings
ygData.msgSnippet: Some of the questions that have been asked in recent posts can be answered at http://www.everquest.allakhazam.com/ Some of the stuff at the site is old, but
ygData.messageBody:
Some of the questions that have been asked in recent posts can be
answered at http://www.everquest.allakhazam.com/

Some of the stuff at the site is old, but still a lot of the
resources available are pretty cool. Especially if you are running EQ
windows and can refer to the web site when needed.

Also someone mentioned not being able to talk to someone on another
server. I thought that to be true too until a few days ago. I
discovered that you can send tells to ppl on other servers. I can't
remember the command right off... something like /tell [sever]:
[character] (exampble /tell Povar:Eressifar) That command may be
wrong so don't hold me to it. You can probably find the command in
the help files.

Now a question of my own. I'm a 21 Dark Elf Shadowknight and am new
to exploring Kunark. I'm currently bound at the Overthere and am
hunting at Lake of Ill Omens. Going from OT to Loio is hard because A
LOT of stuff cons red to me. My question is, is there a better place
for me to be bound? And also what is the closest bank to Loio?

Thanks for the help. Feel free to send me a tell at anytime.

Eressifar Darkheart
Dark Elf Shadowknight 21 season

PS: Anyone else playing on Povar?
